# Looplia Skills

Looplia Skills provides curated skills—packaged as a Claude Code-compatible plugin—to accelerate workflow design, orchestration, and execution.

## Installation

### Claude Code

```bash
# Add the marketplace
/plugin marketplace add memorysaver/looplia-skills

# Install the search-and-research plugin group
/plugin install search-and-research@looplia-skills
```

## Plugin Groups

| Group | Purpose |
|-------|---------|
| **search-and-research** | Searching and discovering information across the internet |
| **context-management** | Managing context, planning, and maintaining persistent memory across sessions |

## Related Projects

- [looplia-core](https://github.com/memorysaver/looplia-core) - Skills-first agentic workflow CLI platform

## Skill Development

To create your own skills, refer to the open source Agent Skills specification:

- [Agent Skills Spec](https://agentskills.io/home)
- [Claude Agent SDK Skills Documentation](https://platform.claude.com/docs/en/agent-sdk/skills)
